questions.prompt: How did it feel to dunk on that team?
What did you think when they leap-frog dunked you?
How did you push 'em off the court so fast?
Why didn't you get up quicker after you got decked?
How will you rebound from this loss?
Will you carry this momentum going forward?
Do you think your team has chemistry?
It seemed like you were being physical out there. Your thoughts?
What did the other team say to you when they were getting up in your face?
You were a little less coordinated than usual out there, don't you think?
